title: Web Developer
description:
Build websites based on client needs, always trying to keep things clean, efficient, and easy to maintain.

Built some tools for the team to speed up the dev process, nothing fancy, but they saved us time and made things more consistent.

Took part in organizing how we do things internally — documenting, improving workflows, and making sure our work wouldn’t break when passed between devs.

title: Customer Service Agent
description: Establish daily communication with clients to resolve issues and provide updates on their investments.

title: Full Stack Developer
description:
I worked remotely on all types of projects — landing pages, woocommerce, and multi-page websites.

Meetings with clients to understand their needs and present some options and ideas for the project.

I also helped train new developers, explaining methodologies, languages, architecture models, and experiences with clients, all to help with the development of new team members.
